query:
UPDATE "Thread" t
                SET "updatedAt" = NOW()
                WHERE t."documentId" = $1 AND t."deletedAt" IS NULL AND t.id = $2
                RETURNING
                    t.id as thread_id, 
                    t.resolved, 
                    t."documentId" as document_id, 
                    t."createdAt"::timestamptz as created_at, 
                    t."updatedAt"::timestamptz as updated_at, 
                    t."deletedAt"::timestamptz as deleted_at, 
                    t.metadata, 
                    t.owner
